properties.entry: SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_USER_NAME, BOOK_PERSONNEL, B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE, BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE, BOOK_APPROVE_YN, BOOK_CHECK_IN, REQUEST, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_FEE, /* 일자 계산해서 넣기 */ A.ACCOMO_NAME FROM BOOK_LIST B JOIN ROOM_INFO R ON(B.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) WHERE A.OWNER_NO = ?
